should look something like this,you add } wrong.

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noobpk")) teleportToX = 3097; teleportToY = 3931; }

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @adamhelloman8 adamhelloman8
item.description:
@adamhelloman8 wrote:

ok im trying to code my server.

i wanted to make or replace new pking area, so i went to client.java, and did this first

}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pkbox”))
{
teleportToX = 2768;
teleportToY = 2772;

and replaced with

}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noobpk”))
{
teleportToX = 3097;
teleportToY = 3931;

after that i compiled server. when i logged on it didn’t work, why not?

Read full topic
